original_text: In that way, all the Israelites brought the Lord's Covenant Box to Jerusalem. They were shouting. They were making loud music with trumpets, cymbals, lyres and harps.
korean_text: 이스라엘 무리는 크게 부르며 뿔나팔과 나팔을 불며 제금을 치며 비파와 수금을 힘있게 타며 여호와의 언약궤를 메어 올렸더라

sentences.original_text: In that way, all the Israelites
brought the Lord's Covenant Box to Jerusalem.
with trumpets, cymbals, lyres and harps.
